108293.「イタタ……ここは……？: Ow, ow... what is this place...?

108294.「遺跡の中だな。ずいぶん上から 落ちたらしい。\n ……ケガはないか？:
We must be inside the ruins. It looks like we
fell from pretty far up. Are you hurt?

108297.「ここから登るのは 無理だろうから \n 別に 出口を探さないとな。:
It's impossible to climb back up from here,
so we'll have to find another way out.

108298.「……巻き込まれたのに 怒らないのね。 \n 夜の神殿にも くわしいみたいだし\:
You aren't mad at me for getting involved...
And you seem to know a lot about this place.
Just who are you...?

108299.「俺は この神殿を調査しに来たんだが……\n キミの姿を見かけて 胸騒ぎがしてね:
I came here to investigate this temple... and
when I saw you, I felt somewhat uneasy.

108300.「……名は ラウルだ。\n よろしく頼むよ 命知らずの お嬢さん？:
...the name's Rahul. It's nice to meet you,
Ms. Daredevil.

108301.「もうっ 子供扱いしないで！\n お嬢さんじゃなくて リィンだってば。:
Hey, don't treat me like a child! And I'm not
"Ms. Daredevil"! It's Lynn!

108302.「そういうことなら 仕方ないから\n あなたが 出口に戻るのを 助けてあげるっ。:
In any case, I'll do what I have to to help
you get out of here. Come on, let's get
moving!

108303.「わっ……！ これって もしかして\n この神殿から 出られなかった人……？:
Eeek...! Is this somebody who wasn't able
to get out of here...?!

108307.「とても 古そうな壁画……。\n いったい 何が書いてあるのかしら？:
A really old looking mural... what could it
possibly mean?

108309.「誓いを交わせしふたりが ふたつの道に別たれて \n ４つの月を結ぶ時 奇跡への:
Two who have exchanged vows will separate
into two paths, and when the four moons are
joined, the way to a miracle will open.

108310.「えっ……！？ \n 辞書なしで 古代文字が 読めるの？:
Huh...?! You can read those ancient letters
without a dictionary?

108311.「まあな。ちょっとした雑学だ。\n それよりも どうやら この文言は\n 何かの:
I guess. It's just some trivia. Apparently
though, this phrase is the key to solving
some sort of mystery.

108312.「ということは……\n この神殿に眠る 秘宝のありかのヒントが\n 記されている:
Then that means... it's probably a clue to the
hidden treasure inside this temple! <heart>

108313.「ふたりが別たれて ４つの月を結ぶ時……ね。: Two people separate and join four moons....

108314.「ほら 部屋の両端に ふたつの扉があるでしょ？\n あたしたちが 別々に進むこと:
Hey, look at the two doors at opposite ends of
the room. You think if we each go one way,
they'll open for us?

108315.「なるほどな……。 \n しかし 誓いを交わせしふたりとあるが\n 何を 誓い合:
I get it... but when it says "two who have
exchanged vows", what exactly does that mean?

108316.「ふ 深い意味はないのよ！\n 仕掛けが解けたら すぐに合流しようとか\n そん:
D-don't get any ideas! It's nothing deep!
Let's just vow to meet up after we solve
this, or whatever.

108318.「わかった。必ず またキミに会うと 誓おう。\n ……無茶はするなよ？:
Okay. I swear that I'll see you again. Just...
...don't do anything stupid, okay?

108319.「ふんっ 子供扱いしないでよねー！: Hmph! Don't treat me like a child!

108321.「ふたつの道に別たれて……という言葉に\n 意味があるのなら 例えば\n ふたり:
Separate into two paths... if that truly means
something, why don't we both try touching
each door at the same time?

108323.かたく閉ざされていた扉は\nふたりが同時に押すと 簡単に開いた！:
The doors which were tightly closed opened
with ease when touched at the same time!

108325.「必ず また会うと 誓ったからな。: I did swear that I'd see you again.

108326.「……キミも 無事のようだな。\n なかなか ウデが立つらしい。:
You seem to be fine yourself...
Looks like you're pretty skilled.

108327.「ふふーん ようやくわかったみたいね！: Heh! Guess you finally realized it, huh?

108328.「この ４つ目の像を手に入れたら\n 何かが 起こるのかもな。:
Maybe something will happen when I take this
fourth statue...

108330.「みてみてっ！\n 壁画が開いて 道ができたわ<heart>:
Would you look at that! The mural opened up
and made a path! <heart>

108331.「キミの読みは 間違ってなかったようだな。\n 気を抜かず 進むぞ。: Looks like you were right. Let's keep moving.

108337.「ナンピトタリトモ 先ヘハ 進マセヌ！！: I will not allow you to go any further!!

108340.「アァ……歴史ハ クリ返サレルトイウノカ……。: Ah... history repeats itself, does it not...?

108343.「この子は あたしを導いてくれた短剣よ<heart>:
This dagger is the one who
guided me! <heart>

108344.「信じてもらえないかもしれないけど……\n 短剣の刀身に 時々\n 幻のように:
Believe it or not...the dagger's blade
sometimes reflected an image of the Temple
of Night. It was like a mirage...

108345.「この短剣は 生まれた時から \n ずっと 一緒だったから……\n 何かの導きな:
This dagger has been with me since I was born,
so I thought it might be some kind of sign.

108346.「……この短剣が 気になるの？: ...is there a problem with this dagger?

108352.「あなたたちが オイラの\n 新しい ご主人さまなんだね！: So you're my new masters, huh?

108353.「オイラ 秘宝への案内人なんだ！\n ご主人さまたちを ジャイラの奇跡へ\n 連:
I will be your guide to the treasure! I'll
take my new masters to Jyra's Miracle!

108354.「すごいわっ！ この子\n 夜の神殿の秘宝へ 案内してくれるみたいっ<heart:
How great! That little guy's gonna lead us
to the hidden treasure! <heart>

108355.「そいつは ありがたいな……。\n だが 案内人なら まずは\n ここから出る方:
Well, that's very kind of you... but if you're
going to be our guide, why don't you tell us
how to get out of here first?

108358.「秘宝への 案内人だなんて……: A guide to the hidden treasure...

108361.「俺も この遺跡に眠るという秘宝を\n この目で 見てみたくなったよ。:
I want to see the treasure in this place
with my own eyes, too.

108362.「ちょっとー！\n 抜けがけは 許さないんだからっ！: Wait! I'm not gonna let you just get away!

108363.「……ここまで導いてくれて ありがとう。\n 今日は きっといい日になるわ！:
...thank you for leading me here. Today's
gonna be a great day!

108364.「言い伝えに残る 夜の神殿が\n こんな所に 隠れてたなんてねっ！:
Who'd've thought that the legendary Temple
of Night would be hiding in a place like
this?!

108365.「あなたのお宝を いただいて \n トレジャーハンター リィンさんの伝説が\n:
I'll take all your treasure! The legend of
Lynn the Treasure Hunter starts today! <heart>

108367.「この旅が終わる時 あたしが\n 生まれてきた意味も きっと わかるわ……。:
When this adventure is over, I'm sure I'll
finally understand the meaning of my birth...

108369.「これが きっと 夜の神殿の入口なのね。\n なんだか おどろおどろしい扉……。:
This must be the entrance to the Temple of
Night. What a scary looking door...

108372.「その扉には さわらないほうがいい。\n 命が惜しいならな。: I wouldn't touch that door if I were you.

108373.「……な なによっ！ \n こんな所で 急に声かけてくるなんて\n オバケかと思:
...h-hey! I thought you were a ghost or
something, sneaking up behind me like that
in a place like this!

108374.「ここは 悪霊が宿るといわれて\n 誰も寄りつかない場所だ。\n キミみたいな若:
This place is said to be inhabited by evil
spirits and it's abandoned. This is no place
for a little girl like you.

108375.「レディを 小娘扱いするなんて 失礼ねッ！:
Don't you know It's rude to treat a lady like
a little girl?!

108376.「あたしは トレジャーハンターのリィンよ。\n お宝を手に入れるためなら 危険も:
I'm Lynn, and I'm a treasure hunter! I'm
willing to take any risk for some treasure.

108377.「そう…… この神殿に眠る秘宝を\n 手に入れるためならねっ！:
That's right... I want the hidden treasure
inside this temple!

120415.ふたりは それぞれ 開いた扉の先へと\n歩みを 進めていった……。:
The two each took a step forward towards
the door they had opened...

120417.<center>それは 決して出会ってはいけなかった\n運命の出会い……:
It was a fateful encounter that should never
have happened...

121594.「はじめての冒険にしては ちょっと \n 手強い相手に なりそうだけど……:
For my first adventure, this might be tough
nut to crack...

121596.月の絵柄を そろえると 壁画が動きはじめた！:
After matching the moon patterns, the mural
began to move!

122518.「４つの月を結ぶ時 奇跡への道は開かれん\n ……だったな。:
"When the four moons are joined, the way to a
miracle will open"... is that right?

122643.「あたしの 体重のせいじゃないんだから……。: So it wasn't because of my weight...
